Added clarification that this enables external positioning system integration, emphasized the conditional nature of when values are used, and improved AI agent understanding of the operation's role in the system.

data.current_description: Set current global position of master electronics from external source. Values are only used if GPS mode is set to use external GPS
data.description_suggestion: Set the current global position of the master electronics from an external source. The provided position values are only applied and used for positioning calculations when the GPS mode is configured to use external GPS. This operation allows integration of external positioning systems with the Underwater GPS.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description is clear but lacks context about when this operation is relevant and its integration purpose. Added clarification that this enables external positioning system integration, emphasized the conditional nature of when values are used, and improved AI agent understanding of the operation's role in the system.

message: Operation 'external#GetOrientation' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary is too generic and uses operation name as summary. Description lacks clarity about what data is returned and the purpose of the orientation. Enhanced version clarifies that this retrieves previously-set orientation data and explains its visualization purpose, helping AI agents understand when to use this operation.

data.current_description: Get orientation of Vehicle/ROV/Locator set by SetOrientation
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the current compass heading and orientation of the Vehicle/ROV/Locator that was previously set via SetOrientation. This orientation is used for visualization in the GUI. Returns the current orientation data including heading angle.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic and uses operation name as summary. Description lacks clarity about what data is returned and the purpose of the orientation. Enhanced version clarifies that this retrieves previously-set orientation data and explains its visualization purpose, helping AI agents understand when to use this operation.

message: Operation 'external#SetOrientation' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary uses operation name format. Description lacks input/output details and clarity about the operation's scope. Enhanced version specifies what input is expected, clarifies that this is visualization-only (not affecting positioning), and indicates what is returned, improving AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description: Set orientation/compass heading of Vehicle/ROV/Locator. This is used only for visualization in GUI
data.description_suggestion: Sets the compass heading and orientation of the Vehicle/ROV/Locator for visualization purposes in the GUI. Accepts heading angle in the request payload. This operation does not affect positioning calculations, only the visual representation. Returns confirmation of the orientation update.
data.reasoning: Original summary uses operation name format. Description lacks input/output details and clarity about the operation's scope. Enhanced version specifies what input is expected, clarifies that this is visualization-only (not affecting positioning), and indicates what is returned, improving AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.

data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve IMU status and orientation data
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the current Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU) status and orientation information. Returns IMU calibration status, current heading, and orientation angles. Use this to monitor IMU health and current orientation state.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too brief and generic. Description lacks specificity about what status and orientation data are returned. Enhanced version clarifies the IMU context, specifies return data types, and provides guidance on when to use this operation for AI agents.

data.description_suggestion: [DEPRECATED] This operation is deprecated and should not be used. Starts the IMU calibration process. Requires specific calibration payload parameters. Returns calibration status. Use SetNorth or ResetGyro operations instead for IMU adjustments.

message: Operation 'imu#ResetGyro' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_output_details, not_actionable. Original summary and description are extremely vague and lack context. Description doesn't explain why you would reset gyros or what the effect is. Enhanced version clarifies the purpose (clearing drift), the effect (improved accuracy), provides return information, and explains when to use this operation, making it actionable for AI agents.

data.description_suggestion: Resets the IMU gyroscope sensors to clear accumulated drift and bias errors. This operation recalibrates the gyroscope to improve orientation accuracy. Returns confirmation of the gyroscope reset operation. Typically used when gyroscope drift is detected or after system startup.
data.reasoning: Original summary and description are extremely vague and lack context. Description doesn't explain why you would reset gyros or what the effect is. Enhanced version clarifies the purpose (clearing drift), the effect (improved accuracy), provides return information, and explains when to use this operation, making it actionable for AI agents.

message: Operation 'imu#SetNorth' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary and description are too vague and lack domain context. 'Set north point' doesn't clarify what this means in IMU context. Enhanced version explains this is for compass calibration, specifies input requirements, clarifies the effect on heading calculations, and provides guidance on when to use this operation.

data.summary_suggestion: Set magnetic north reference for IMU
data.description_suggestion: Sets the magnetic north reference point for the IMU compass calibration. Accepts a heading angle or direction in the request payload to establish the north reference. This operation calibrates the compass heading relative to magnetic north. Returns confirmation of the north reference update. Use this after compass drift is detected or during initial system setup.
data.reasoning: Original summary and description are too vague and lack domain context. 'Set north point' doesn't clarify what this means in IMU context. Enhanced version explains this is for compass calibration, specifies input requirements, clarifies the effect on heading calculations, and provides guidance on when to use this operation.
